summary: Maroon 5 is an American pop rock band from Los Angeles, formed in 1994. Originally known as Kara's Flowers, they released an album but weren't successful. They reformed as Maroon 5 in 2001 with a new member and signed to a different label. Their debut album, "Songs About Jane," was a big hit, winning a Grammy in 2005. The band has since released several more successful albums and singles, selling over 135 million records worldwide. They've had lineup changes over the years and their latest album, "Jordi," came out in 2021.
title: Maroon 5
